attributes.action: Create Free Trade agreements with economically powerful countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One of the main reasons Britain was initially very successful was due to the relatively free trade within the commonwealth.

Establishing free trade agreements with economically powerful nations such as China, Korea, Japan, Singapore, USA and Canada would increase britains ability to grow and prosper.

The Network such networks would deliver could ensure unrivalled prosperity for the UK.
